name: Nguyen Thi Ngoc Thuy
bio_short: A passionate graphic and illustration designer, always seeking opportunities to create unique and creative visual experiences.
bio_long: With over 4 years of experience in graphic design, I have participated in diverse projects, especially in the spa, cosmetics, and beauty industry. From brand identity development, product packaging design to website interfaces and advertising materials, I always focus on expressing elegance, sophistication, and visual emotions suitable for these sectors. I continuously learn and am ready to face challenges to develop my skills and bring innovative, breakthrough creative values to clients. My design style is a combination of modern aesthetics and fresh, gentle vibes.

responsibilities: Designed logos, posters, and GDN for companies such as Leadup, Phát Đạt.
Executed UI design for web projects in football and finance sectors.
Built brand identity systems for clients in dental care, spa, and cosmetics fields.

work_experience.company_name: BING AGENCY Media & Solutions Co., Ltd.
responsibilities: Assigned and reviewed designs from the design team.
Directly worked with clients and content teams to develop visual concepts.
Designed images for spas, beauty products, and e-commerce platforms (Shopee, Lazada, TikTok Live, etc.).
Supported and edited designs for team members.
Designed images for fanpages and websites.
Created SEO images and visuals for clinics and dental care.

work_experience.company_name: Your Media Advertising & Communication Co., Ltd.
responsibilities: Designed fanpage images for various beauty and health brands.
Cooperated with content teams to produce media visuals.
Designed according to campaigns and brand directions.
